page.title: 01Introduction to Stock
page.content: Stock is a village with the{population of around 3000.Stock is very scenic.It has got two{bus services.}The majority of land is{farm land.}The majority of people are old.The houses are quite big.Some houses have not got front gardens.On the other hand some houses like Greenwoods have a big front and back garden.Stock is quite large for a village.Stock has a large number and variety of{clubs}including Bowling and Horticultural Societies. Lots of people grow their own vegtables.There are 6{Pubs}in our D Block.Most people do some{shopping in the village shops which include a Post Office,general store,butchers and grocers.For other shopping they go to South Woodham or Chelmsford.The public library opens several times a week. Altogether Stock is a very quiet and peaceful little town.
